### Lesson5: Creating a ggplot

![](https://youtu.be/3KveTw8uDZA)\

### Exercise 5 

Please use `ggplot2` to generate a scatterplot between `displ`(on the x-axis) and `cty`(on the y-axis) of the `mpg` data.

```{r cyl, exercise=TRUE}

```

```{r cyl-solution}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(data = mpg) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = cty))
```
